column2: Dug in Deep
column3: Глубоко закопанный

column2: Landing site secure. Let's do what we agreed, Commander. Scout out that data relay and take it from there. Good luck.
column3: Landing site secure. Let's do what we agreed, Commander. Scout out that data relay and take it from there. Good luck.

column2: Great job, Commander! Now they can re-establish their data relay.
column3: Отличная работа, командир! Теперь они могут восстановить ретрансляцию данных.

column2: The loss of that data cache and relay station is bad news for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}. Let's figure out our next step.
column3: The loss of that data cache and relay station is bad news for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}. Let's figure out our next step.

column2: No wonder the data steam cut off. This place has been slagged. Maybe there's more we can find out in the main compound.
column3: No wonder the data steam cut off. This place has been slagged. Maybe there's more we can find out in the main compound.

column2: *** DETECTED INCOMING FORCES OF UNKNOWN ORIGIN ****  ...  *** RED ALERT STATUS ***
column3: *** ОБНАРУЖЕНЫ ПРИБЛИЖАЮЩИЕСЯ НЕОПОЗНАННЫЕ ЦЕЛИ **** ... *** БОЕВАЯ ТРЕВОГА! ***

column2: Red alert status for unknown forces? They've got their defenses fully primed. What's going on?!
column3: Red alert status for unknown forces? They've got their defenses fully primed. What's going on?!

column2: A lance of mechs?! We were told to expect minor resistance. Shit... Lance! Engage!
column3: Отряд мехов?! Нам было сказано ожидать незначительного сопротивления. Дерьмо... Отряд! Вступаем в бой!

column2: Looks like we've walked into a full assault, Commander. Contacts are hostile and incoming.
column3: Looks like we've walked into a full assault, Commander. Contacts are hostile and incoming.

column2: At least this data relay has some kind of turret defenses. They're booting up now.
column3: По крайней мере, у этого ретранслятора данных есть какая-то защита из турелей. Они сейчас загружаются.

column2: Is everything ok down there, Commander? Looks like those turrets were hacked. Something is definitely not right here. Let's move on to the next base.
column3: Is everything ok down there, Commander? Looks like those turrets were hacked. Something is definitely not right here. Let's move on to the next base.

column2: We either came at the right time or the worst time. Good job on dispatching that assault. I fear that's not the last of them though. Expect more OpFor, Commander.
column3: We either came at the right time or the worst time. Good job on dispatching that assault. I fear that's not the last of them though. Expect more OpFor, Commander.

column2: {COMPANY.CompanyName}! We weren't expecting to see you - in one piece, anyway. What a sight for sore eyes. Welcome to the front lines!
column3: {COMPANY.CompanyName}! Мы не ожидали увидеть тебя - во всяком случае, в целости и сохранности. Какое зрелище для уставших глаз. Добро пожаловать на передовую!

column2: Front lines? Lucky us. We've been sent by {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} to aid and assist. How are you all doing in there? What's the sitrep?
column3: Линия фронта? Нам повезло. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} послал нас для поддержки и помощи. Как у вас там дела? Какова обстановка?

column2: We first noticed our data streams were being interrupted then had the odd scout probe our defenses. You arrived right on time for the main event it seems.
column3: We first noticed our data streams were being interrupted then had the odd scout probe our defenses. You arrived right on time for the main event it seems.

column2: We've got contacts! Incoming!
column3: We've got contacts! Incoming!

column2: Interrupted mid-stream? Not much does that, Commander. We better be ready for anything down there.
column3: Interrupted mid-stream? Not much does that, Commander. We better be ready for anything down there.

column2: Establish SitRep
column3: Доложить обстановку

column2: Survive the turrets in alpha base
column3: Survive the turrets in alpha base

column2: Survive the defenses
column3: Survive the defenses

column2: Link up with the main compound
column3: Link up with the main compound

column2: Link up with the main compound
column3: Link up with the main compound

column2: Destroy the lance that is invading
column3: Уничтожьте вторгающееся копьё

column2: Destroy invading lance
column3: Уничтожить вторгшееся копьё

column2: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base
column3: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base

column2: Destroy the hacked base turrets
column3: Уничтожьте турели взломанной базы

column2: Last week, radio coms with a strategic outpost was interrupted mid datastream to one of the remote relays and we've been unable to reestablish contact. Our other units are all tied up, so we need you to make contact and get a sitrep.
column3: Last week, radio coms with a strategic outpost was interrupted mid datastream to one of the remote relays and we've been unable to reestablish contact. Our other units are all tied up, so we need you to make contact and get a sitrep.

column2: Heavy Static
column3: Тяжелая статика

column2: We've received very little intel on this situation. We just know they went dark and we assume jamming is involved. Careful out there, Commander.
column3: We've received very little intel on this situation. We just know they went dark and we assume jamming is involved. Careful out there, Commander.

column2: Great job, Commander! They always say you can't judge these types of contracts.
column3: Отличная работа, командир! Они всегда говорят, что о таких контрактах нельзя судить сходу.

column2: It's me again, Commander! I've managed to activate our base defenses. Locked them all shortly before we lost control. Give them hell!
column3: It's me again, Commander! I've managed to activate our base defenses. Locked them all shortly before we lost control. Give them hell!

column2: Commander! Are we glad to see you! {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forward base {TGT_SYSTEM.name}-Alpha.
column3: Командир! Как мы рады вас видеть! {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} передовая база {TGT_SYSTEM.name}-Альфа.

column2: We've been holding off assaults on our position for the past few weeks. We've fallen back to this base but we can't hold out for much longer.
column3: We've been holding off assaults on our position for the past few weeks. We've fallen back to this base but we can't hold out for much longer.

column2: We've got contacts! Incoming!
column3: We've got contacts! Incoming!

column2: The loss of that position will come at a bad time for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}. No good news for us either.
column3: The loss of that position will come at a bad time for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}. No good news for us either.

column2: Strange. There looks like there's been fighting here but it was a least a few weeks ago. Let's look up on ahead. Maybe we'll find something at the other base.
column3: Strange. There looks like there's been fighting here but it was a least a few weeks ago. Let's look up on ahead. Maybe we'll find something at the other base.

column2: What's this?! The turrets are activating. Incoming fire, Commander!
column3: What's this?! The turrets are activating. Incoming fire, Commander!

column2: We were told to expect interference. Time to shut you out.
column3: We were told to expect interference. Time to shut you out.

column2: This isn't good, Commander. You're surrounded!
column3: This isn't good, Commander. You're surrounded!

column2: Hey! That base's automated turrets are spinning up. Lucky us!
column3: Эй! Автоматические турели этой базы начали вращатся. Нам повезло!

column2: Is everything ok down there, Commander? Looks like those turrets were hacked. Something is definitely not right here. Let's move on to the next base.
column3: Is everything ok down there, Commander? Looks like those turrets were hacked. Something is definitely not right here. Let's move on to the next base.

column2: How did these guys get the jump on us? We've been getting too much bad intel. This is now officially a hot zone. Let's continue our investigation. Expect more OpFor, Commander.
column3: How did these guys get the jump on us? We've been getting too much bad intel. This is now officially a hot zone. Let's continue our investigation. Expect more OpFor, Commander.

column2: Unidentified BattleMech lance. Declare yourself. You are violating a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} militarised zone
column3: Unidentified BattleMech lance. Declare yourself. You are violating a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} militarised zone

column2: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} radio operator. We are {COMPANY.CompanyName} and have been hired to check the sit rep here. You've been out of contact for weeks. Everything ok here?
column3: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} радист. Мы - {COMPANY.CompanyName}, и нас наняли, чтобы проверить, есть ли здесь местный представитель. nym} радист. Мы-КОМПАНИЯ.CompanyName} и были наняты для проверки сидячего представителя здесь. Ты уже несколько недель не выходишь на связь. Здесь все в порядке?

column2: Everything's fi..***STATIC***
column3: Все в поря...***ШУМ***

column2: Commander! It's a trap! Watch ou...***STATIC***
column3: Командир! Это ловушка! Осторож...*** ПОМЕХИ ***

column2: Damn it! Gun them down now!
column3: Черт возьми! Пристрелите их сейчас же!

column2: It's me again, Commander! I'm going to try and activate the turrets... ***BANG***
column3: It's me again, Commander! I'm going to try and activate the turrets... ***BANG***

column2: That sorts you out. Thanks for unlocking those turrets for us.
column3: That sorts you out. Thanks for unlocking those turrets for us.

column2: Commander, this isn't good. Watch out for those base defenses!
column3: Командир, это нехорошо. Следите за обороной базы!

column2: Forward base is a little misleading, Commander. I've heard rumours it's more a spy station. Let's go find out what's going on.
column3: Передовая база вводит в заблуждение, командир. Ходят слухи, что это скорее шпионская станция. Пойдем выясним, что происходит.

column2: Investigate the Blackout
column3: Investigate the Blackout

column2: Survive the turret trap in alpha base
column3: Survive the turret trap in alpha base

column2: Survive the trap
column3: Survive the trap

column2: Follow the trail to the next base
column3: Иди по следу до следующей базы

column2: Follow the Trail
column3: Иди по следу

column2: Destroy the lance that is invading
column3: Уничтожьте вторгающееся копьё

column2: Destroy invading lance
column3: Уничтожить вторгшееся копьё

column2: Destroy the lance that is occupying the base
column3: Уничтожьте копье, занимающее базу

column2: Destroy occupying lance
column3: Уничтожить оккупирующее копьё

column2: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base
column3: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base

column2: Destroy the hacked base turrets
column3: Уничтожьте турели взломанной базы

column2: We recently lost contact with one of our forward bases in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system. We've heard rumours of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity near here so it might be related. We need you to go in and investigate for us.
column3: We recently lost contact with one of our forward bases in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system. We've heard rumours of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} activity near here so it might be related. We need you to go in and investigate for us.

column2: Unknown Cause
column3: Unknown Cause

column2: We've been informed there's two main bases for the Biolab. Let's head to the first one and scout it out. And... try not to take any deep breaths out there, Commander.
column3: We've been informed there's two main bases for the Biolab. Let's head to the first one and scout it out. And... try not to take any deep breaths out there, Commander.

column2: Good job there, Commander. Let's hope that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} crew weren't right about that virus.
column3: Хорошая работа, командир. Будем надеяться, что команда {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} была не права насчет вируса.

column2: *** DETECTED OCCUPYING FORCE *** ... *** VIRUS DETECTED ON OCCUPYING UNITS *** .... *** ACTIVATING DEVICE NETWORK ***
column3: *** ОБНАРУЖЕНА ОККУПАЦИОННАЯ СИЛА *** ... *** ВИРУС ОБНАРУЖЕН НА ОККУПАЦИОННЫХ ЕДИНИЦАХ *** .... *** АКТИВАЦИЯ СЕТИ УСТРОЙСТВ ***

column2: Commander! Are we glad to see you! {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} Biolab {TGT_SYSTEM.name}-Delta.
column3: Командир! Как мы рады вас видеть! {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} Биолаборатория {TGT_SYSTEM.name}-Дельта.

column2: We had a containment breach on one of our projects. Nothing serious I assure you and we have it under control. However, it looks like we've pushed the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} watchers too far. They're determined to wipe us out!
column3: We had a containment breach on one of our projects. Nothing serious I assure you and we have it under control. However, it looks like we've pushed the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} watchers too far. They're determined to wipe us out!

column2: We've got contacts! Incoming!
column3: We've got contacts! Incoming!

column2: This virus will be a problem now, Commander. Let's get you back.
column3: This virus will be a problem now, Commander. Let's get you back.

column2: There are a few dead bodies scattered around the base here, Commander. I hate to say it but maybe there's something going on with this biolab. Let's check the biolab complex.
column3: There are a few dead bodies scattered around the base here, Commander. I hate to say it but maybe there's something going on with this biolab. Let's check the biolab complex.

column2: *** DETECTED UNKNOWN FORCE *** ... *** VIRUS BREACH DETECTED *** .... *** ACTIVATING DEVICE NETWORK ***
column3: *** ОБНАРУЖЕНА НЕИЗВЕСТНАЯ СИЛА *** ... *** ОБНАРУЖЕНО ВИРУСНОЕ ВТОРЖЕНИЕ *** .... *** АКТИВАЦИЯ СЕТИ УСТРОЙСТВ ***

column2: Watch out, Commander! Turrets coming online!
column3: Watch out, Commander! Turrets coming online!

column2: We knew your damned experiments here would ruin us, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}. Now you've released that virus and killed us all. At least we'll take you with us first.
column3: We knew your damned experiments here would ruin us, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}. Now you've released that virus and killed us all. At least we'll take you with us first.

column2: Virus? Commander, incoming hostiles!
column3: Virus? Commander, incoming hostiles!

column2: *** DETECTED UNKNOWN FORCE *** ... *** VIRUS DETECTED *** .... *** ACTIVATING DEVICE NETWORK ***
column3: *** ОБНАРУЖЕНА НЕИЗВЕСТНАЯ СИЛА *** ... *** ОБНАРУЖЕН ВИРУС *** .... *** АКТИВАЦИЯ СЕТИ УСТРОЙСТВ ***

column2: What was all that about a virus? To be on the safe side I wouldn't leave your mechs whilst you're down there. Let's move to the biolab complex to figure this out.
column3: What was all that about a virus? To be on the safe side I wouldn't leave your mechs whilst you're down there. Let's move to the biolab complex to figure this out.

column2: A {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} attack? Virus? What the hell is going on here? Let's get this over with fast.
column3: Атака {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}? Вирус? Что, черт возьми, здесь происходит? Давайте побыстрее покончим с этим.

column2: Unidentified BattleMech lance. This base has been put under quarantine by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. Leave this area now.
column3: Unidentified BattleMech lance. This base has been put under quarantine by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. Leave this area now.

column2: {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} radio operator. You have illegally taken over this {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base. Leave or be forced out.
column3: {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} радист. Вы незаконно захватили эту базу {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}. Выйдите или вас вышвырнут.

column2: You leave us no choice. Contain and control those Mercs!
column3: You leave us no choice. Contain and control those Mercs!

column2: Watch out, Commander! Base defenses are coming online!
column3: Watch out, Commander! Base defenses are coming online!

column2: Bio research station? We better be careful here, Commander. I don't fancy catching a new type of cold, if you know what I mean?
column3: Биологическая исследовательская станция? Нам лучше быть здесь поосторожнее, командир. Я не хочу заболеть новым типом простуды, если вы понимаете, о чем я?

column2: Investigate the Biolab
column3: Investigate the Biolab

column2: Survive the bioscan in alpha base
column3: Survive the bioscan in alpha base

column2: Survive the bioscan
column3: Survive the bioscan

column2: Head to the biolab in the next base
column3: Отправляйтесь в биолаб. на следующей базе

column2: Head to the Biolab complex
column3: Отправляйтесь в комплекс Биолаб

column2: Destroy the lance that is invading
column3: Уничтожьте вторгающееся копьё

column2: Destroy invading lance
column3: Уничтожить вторгшееся копьё

column2: Destroy the lance that is occupying the base
column3: Уничтожьте копье, занимающее базу

column2: Destroy occupying lance
column3: Уничтожить оккупирующее копьё

column2: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base
column3: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base

column2: Destroy the hacked base turrets
column3: Уничтожьте турели взломанной базы

column2: One of our bio research stations has gone dark in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system. We've not sure why but {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} affiliated groups have been asking about purchasing some specific supplies we also use in that system. Investigate and find out what's going on.
column3: One of our bio research stations has gone dark in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system. We've not sure why but {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} affiliated groups have been asking about purchasing some specific supplies we also use in that system. Investigate and find out what's going on.

column2: At High Noon
column3: Точно в полдень

column2: These guys aren't inexperienced so watch out and good luck, Commander.
column3: These guys aren't inexperienced so watch out and good luck, Commander.

column2: Way to go, Commander! I even managed to record that for the crew's holovid room!
column3: Way to go, Commander! I even managed to record that for the crew's holovid room!

column2: These brothers are a lot better than we gave them credit for.
column3: These brothers are a lot better than we gave them credit for.

column2: Think you Mercfaces canna beat us twos? Hella no. Eat lead.
column3: Think you Mercfaces canna beat us twos? Hella no. Eat lead.

column2: Straight out of the holovids, Commander. A showdown at high noon... or whatever time it will be on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}.
column3: Straight out of the holovids, Commander. A showdown at high noon... or whatever time it will be on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}.

column2: Defeat the Jarman brothers
column3: Победите братьев Джарман

column2: Our bases in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} have been plagued by the local Jarman brothers. With support from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} they continually raid our supplies and we've had enough. Using their overconfidence against them we've baited them into accepting a duel with us. Can you help us out?
column3: Our bases in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} have been plagued by the local Jarman brothers. With support from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} they continually raid our supplies and we've had enough. Using their overconfidence against them we've baited them into accepting a duel with us. Can you help us out?

column2: Double Trouble
column3: Двойные проблемы

column2: Ready up, Commander.
column3: Ready up, Commander.

column2: It's unfortunate how this has turned out but we can't back down now. Sort these {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} guards out then let's get out of here.
column3: It's unfortunate how this has turned out but we can't back down now. Sort these {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} guards out then let's get out of here.

column2: Glad you did it, Commander but time to run! Reports of this duel are reaching the airwaves.
column3: Рад, что вы это сделали, командир, но пора бежать! Сообщения об этой дуэли достигли эфира.

column2: This isn't how it should have turned out, Commander. Let's get going. Nothing more we can do.
column3: This isn't how it should have turned out, Commander. Let's get going. Nothing more we can do.

column2: Commander, looks like those two guys that the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} crew ticked off last night were actually {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} guards. Looks like we've got ourselves a duel.
column3: Командир, похоже, что те двое парней, которых команда {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} отметила прошлой ночью, на самом деле были охранниками {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}. Похоже, нам предстоит дуэль.

column2: Defeat Guards
column3: Победить стражников

column2: Last night a few of our crew members took some much needed R&R at the local {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} bar. Words were said and now it looks like we're stuck in a duel with two apparent {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} guards. Our crew aren't fighters so maybe you can help us out?
column3: Last night a few of our crew members took some much needed R&R at the local {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} bar. Words were said and now it looks like we're stuck in a duel with two apparent {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} guards. Our crew aren't fighters so maybe you can help us out?

column2: Festive Couple
column3: Праздничная пара

column2: The crowd is cheering for you two, Commander.
column3: The crowd is cheering for you two, Commander.

column2: Hah! That was a great show, Commander. Great job!
column3: Ха! Это было отличное шоу, командир. Отличная работа!

column2: I think we've just rained on the festival celebrations with this loss.
column3: I think we've just rained on the festival celebrations with this loss.

column2: Let's make this a good show but make no mistake. We're winning this!
column3: Let's make this a good show but make no mistake. We're winning this!

column2: This actually sounds like fun! I'll have you both on coms the entire time but the rest of the crew will be cheering you on from the crowd. Let's do this, Commander.
column3: This actually sounds like fun! I'll have you both on coms the entire time but the rest of the crew will be cheering you on from the crowd. Let's do this, Commander.

column2: Defeat the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team
column3: Победите команду {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}

column2: As with every year at this festive time on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} we host an arena fight for the people. This year we'd like you to be our representative. Your duo duel is against {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. We're placing our trust in you so please don't let us down.
column3: Как и каждый год в это праздничное время, на {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, мы устраиваем бой на арене для людей. В этом году мы хотим, чтобы вы были нашим представителем. Ваш дуэльный поединок против {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. Мы доверяем вам, поэтому, пожалуйста, не подведите нас.

column2: Last Minute Replacements
column3: Last Minute Replacements

column2: Looks like those expert duelists are waiting for you. Good luck, Commander.
column3: Looks like those expert duelists are waiting for you. Good luck, Commander.

column2: And down they go! Fantastic display, Commander.
column3: И они падают! Фантастическое зрелище, командир.

column2: Let's get you out of here, Commander. It couldn't be helped.
column3: Let's get you out of here, Commander. It couldn't be helped.

column2: Finally! We thought you both had chickened out.
column3: Ну наконец то! Мы думали, вы оба струсили.

column2: So, pick up the mess AND give away the credit. What a raw situation. At least the MRB knows the deal.
column3: So, pick up the mess AND give away the credit. What a raw situation. At least the MRB knows the deal.

column2: Defeat the duelists
column3: Победите дуэлянтов

column2: We're in a bit of trouble. Two of our pilots challenged two long standing {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} duelists to a fight. Only now our pilots are nowhere to be found. Can you step in and take their spots please? Of course, you'd have to pretend to be our pilots.
column3: We're in a bit of trouble. Two of our pilots challenged two long standing {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} duelists to a fight. Only now our pilots are nowhere to be found. Can you step in and take their spots please? Of course, you'd have to pretend to be our pilots.

column2: Words Hurt
column3: Words Hurt

column2: The duelists are out there on the other side of the arena. Good luck, Commander.
column3: The duelists are out there on the other side of the arena. Good luck, Commander.

column2: There we go. Issue settled. Back to the dropship, Commander.
column3: There we go. Issue settled. Back to the dropship, Commander.

column2: This isn't how things should be. You shouldn't be able to repress the truth like this.
column3: This isn't how things should be. You shouldn't be able to repress the truth like this.

column2: You will retract that report. Right. Now.
column3: You will retract that report. Right. Now.

column2: I just don't know, Commander. When people say they want to 'fight' allegations it's not meant to be a real fight. This {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Governor is crazy. Let's uphold the truth... for a price.
column3: I just don't know, Commander. When people say they want to 'fight' allegations it's not meant to be a real fight. This {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Governor is crazy. Let's uphold the truth... for a price.

column2: Defeat the duelists
column3: Победите дуэлянтов

column2: We've been informed by one of the largest news networks that a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Governor has taken issue with a recently released report on military fund spending irregularities. She's demanded a duel to fight those allegations. We'd like to hire you to represent and uphold that worthy news report, Commander.
column3: We've been informed by one of the largest news networks that a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Governor has taken issue with a recently released report on military fund spending irregularities. She's demanded a duel to fight those allegations. We'd like to hire you to represent and uphold that worthy news report, Commander.

column2: Yearly Tussle
column3: Yearly Tussle

column2: Our employers have won this every year for the past four years. No pressure, Commander.
column3: Our employers have won this every year for the past four years. No pressure, Commander.

column2: You did it! Time to organise the party. We can't let all this go to waste!
column3: You did it! Time to organise the party. We can't let all this go to waste!

column2: Our employers can't expect to win this every year I suppose.
column3: Our employers can't expect to win this every year I suppose.

column2: Ready yourself, Mercs. We've got a reputation to uphold and an appetite to satisfy.
column3: Ready yourself, Mercs. We've got a reputation to uphold and an appetite to satisfy.

column2: What do you think? Maybe we can get some of this good food and fine wine as part of the deal!
column3: What do you think? Maybe we can get some of this good food and fine wine as part of the deal!

column2: Defeat Duelists
column3: Победить дуэлянтов

column2: Every year we {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}s in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} continue a historic procedure with the local {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}s. We both field mercenaries and whoever wins claims a years worth of good food and fine wines. Our usual mercenaries who help us were recently and unexpectedly wiped out by a failed jumpship jump, so we've come to you for help.
column3: Every year we {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}s in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} continue a historic procedure with the local {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}s. We both field mercenaries and whoever wins claims a years worth of good food and fine wines. Our usual mercenaries who help us were recently and unexpectedly wiped out by a failed jumpship jump, so we've come to you for help.

column2: All Eyes On
column3: Всё внимание на

column2: Here we go, Commander.
column3: Поехали, командир.

column2: You're all set up to be recorded and analysed. Time to show them a thing or two, Commander.
column3: You're all set up to be recorded and analysed. Time to show them a thing or two, Commander.

column2: And there we go. I expect to see a lot more of those moves in the future. Guess we should be ready for that ourselves.
column3: И вот так. Я ожидаю увидеть намного больше таких шагов в будущем. Думаю, мы должны быть готовы к этому сами.

column2: Let's get out of here. I guess they won't be using that data after all.
column3: Let's get out of here. I guess they won't be using that data after all.

column2: There's worse ways to make money than influencing a whole new generation of pilot's fighting styles. Sounds fun!
column3: There's worse ways to make money than influencing a whole new generation of pilot's fighting styles. Sounds fun!

column2: Overcome the test subject
column3: Overcome the test subject

column2: Commander, you've been very active. Active and successful. We're developing a new type of BattleMech simulator and we need new and improved data. Sound interesting? Good, because we want to analyse how you fight {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. We've arranged for an ex-{TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} pilot to fight you for a data gathering exercise. What do you say? You'll be well rewarded.
column3: Командир, вы были очень активны. Активны и успешны. Мы разрабатываем новый тип симулятора боевых роботов, и нам нужны новые и улучшенные данные. Звучит интересно? Хорошо, потому что мы хотим проанализировать, как вы сражаетесь с силами {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}. Мы договорились, что бывший пилот{TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} будет сражаться с вами за сбор данных. Что скажешь? Вы будете хорошо вознаграждены.

column2: A Taste For War
column3: Вкус к войне

column2: Here we go, Commander.
column3: Поехали, командир.

column2: All the holo-cams are focused on you guys so put up a show but finish that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} champion in style.
column3: Все голокамеры направлены на вас, ребята, так что устройте шоу, но добейте с шиком этого чемпиона {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}.

column2: Good job, Commander! That should put to rest any doubts on our skill.
column3: Хорошая работа, командир! Это развееть любые сомнения в нашем мастерстве.

column2: Well... at least we didn't go down without a fight. Let's hope the holo-cams got your good side, Commander.
column3: Well... at least we didn't go down without a fight. Let's hope the holo-cams got your good side, Commander.

column2: Commander, this seems like a straight up duel. It's based in an established arena so I guess it's as good as we'll get to 'safe'.
column3: Командир, это похоже на честную дуэль. Она проходит на известной арене, так что я думаю, что это так же хорошо, как и безопасно.

column2: Destroy Enemy Champion
column3: Уничтожить вражеского чемпиона

column2: A prized {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Gladiator has challenged you to solo combat, Commander. The holovid rights have already been sold to the highest bidder and we've already been wired a cut. We can't turn this chance down so we hope you can't too! We'll throw in the holo-vid footage for {COMPANY.CompanyName}'s promotional vids.
column3: Призёр {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Гладиатор вызвал вас на поединок, командир. Права на головид уже проданы тому, кто предложил самую высокую цену, и мы уже получили долю. Мы не можем отказаться от этого шанса, поэтому мы надеемся, что вы тоже не упустите! Мы добавим голо-вид материалы для рекламных роликов компании {COMPANY.CompanyName}.

column2: Challenge Accepted
column3: Вызов принят

column2: That's the one, Commander. Take him out.
column3: That's the one, Commander. Take him out.

column2: Done and done. Great job, Commander. Let's go home.
column3: Сделано и сделано. Отличная работа, командир. Давай пойдем домой.

column2: We're coming in to pick you up fast, Commander. Hold on. We'll sort out the political fallout from this later.
column3: We're coming in to pick you up fast, Commander. Hold on. We'll sort out the political fallout from this later.

column2: I know they said they were going to send a proxy but, a lowly Merc? What a waste of a perfectly good duel.
column3: I know they said they were going to send a proxy but, a lowly Merc? What a waste of a perfectly good duel.

column2: No ammo left? What kind of idiot set up their supply lines. Let's clean this duel up and cash in, Commander.
column3: No ammo left? What kind of idiot set up their supply lines. Let's clean this duel up and cash in, Commander.

column2: Destroy Duelist Commander
column3: Уничтожить командира-дуэлянта

column2: Over the past few weeks we've been engaged in small stage skirmishes with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} in and around {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. The company commander must feel they can't continue their campaign because they've requested a duel to claim this local forward base. Little do they know that we've recently run out of supplies so we've very much taken them up on their offer. This is where you come in. We need to you win this for us, Commander.
column3: Over the past few weeks we've been engaged in small stage skirmishes with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} in and around {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. The company commander must feel they can't continue their campaign because they've requested a duel to claim this local forward base. Little do they know that we've recently run out of supplies so we've very much taken them up on their offer. This is where you come in. We need to you win this for us, Commander.

column2: Cornered Revenge
column3: Месть в трудном положении

column2: Last time we saw Killbox she was stuck on that moon, Commander. Not sure how they got off it. Guess it doesn't matter now. Good luck!
column3: Last time we saw Killbox she was stuck on that moon, Commander. Not sure how they got off it. Guess it doesn't matter now. Good luck!

column2: I'm glad you got out of that in one piece, Commander. Victories like this feel hollow though.
column3: I'm glad you got out of that in one piece, Commander. Victories like this feel hollow though.

column2: Killbox! We've got our lances incoming to wipe you out if you go any further. Leave now!
column3: Killbox! We've got our lances incoming to wipe you out if you go any further. Leave now!

column2: Never thought you'd see me again, Commander? You wouldn't if it wasn't for {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} helping me off that forsaken moon. I can't forgive you for what you did. Now... unlike last time - let's finish this once and for all!
column3: Never thought you'd see me again, Commander? You wouldn't if it wasn't for {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} helping me off that forsaken moon. I can't forgive you for what you did. Now... unlike last time - let's finish this once and for all!

column2: Killbox'? Haven't heard that name for a long time. Do you think she's still upset after all these years?\n----\n'Killbox'? Haven't heard that name for a long time. Do you think she's still upset after all these years?
column3: Killbox'? Haven't heard that name for a long time. Do you think she's still upset after all these years?

column2: Defeat Killbox
column3: Победить коробку с пушками

column2: We have a BattleMech causing us trouble in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} who refuses to back down until you, Commander, show up and fight them in a duel. They call themselves Killbox. I don't know what their problem is with you but we'll pay you to get here and just deal with them. It's causing us a headache.
column3: We have a BattleMech causing us trouble in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} who refuses to back down until you, Commander, show up and fight them in a duel. They call themselves Killbox. I don't know what their problem is with you but we'll pay you to get here and just deal with them. It's causing us a headache.

column2: Life Lesson
column3: Life Lesson

column2: There he is, Commander.
column3: There he is, Commander.

column2: This might be a real easy job but it's a job all the same. Knock him about a bit then finish things up. His Dad will be happier than he'll be.
column3: This might be a real easy job but it's a job all the same. Knock him about a bit then finish things up. His Dad will be happier than he'll be.

column2: He should get over his shock in a week or so, Commander. He might be sore for a bit longer.
column3: Он должен преодолеть шок примерно через неделю, командир. Он может болеть еще немного.

column2: That was unexpected, Commander. I don't think his Dad will pay up since we've just subjected him to a few years of bragging.
column3: That was unexpected, Commander. I don't think his Dad will pay up since we've just subjected him to a few years of bragging.

column2: So you're the rubbish my father is sending to train against? Just like the other servants... pitiful.
column3: So you're the rubbish my father is sending to train against? Just like the other servants... pitiful.

column2: I have to hand it to this guy. At least he cares enough about his son to teach him a thing or two. Even if that means a knock on the head... or two.
column3: I have to hand it to this guy. At least he cares enough about his son to teach him a thing or two. Even if that means a knock on the head... or two.

column2: Destroy Arrogant Step-Son's Mech
column3: Уничтожьте мех высокомерного пасынка

column2: A rich {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} business man has requested that we show his arrogant step-son what real fighting feels like. We thought {COMPANY.CompanyName} could help us here. Don't hold back. This father wants to teach a real life lesson - especially for his {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} side of the family.
column3: Богатый бизнесмен {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} попросил, чтобы мы показали его высокомерному пасынку, что такое настоящая борьба. Мы подумали, что {COMPANY.CompanyName} может нам здесь помочь. Не сдерживайся. Этот отец хочет преподать урок из реальной жизни - особенно для своих {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} родственников.

column2: Proxy War
column3: Proxy War

column2: At least we're keeping casualties down to a minimum here. Good luck, Commander.
column3: По крайней мере, здесь мы сводим потери к минимуму. Удачи, командир.

column2: Job done and we've saved some stuck up Governor their job. Time to get some rest, Commander.
column3: Job done and we've saved some stuck up Governor their job. Time to get some rest, Commander.

column2: Well, they did say they weren't going to acknowledge a loss. See how that works out. Let's get you back to the dropship, Commander.
column3: Well, they did say they weren't going to acknowledge a loss. See how that works out. Let's get you back to the dropship, Commander.

column2: In the name of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} I hereby challenge you to this war for {TGT_SYSTEM.name}! To the victor the spoils!
column3: In the name of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} I hereby challenge you to this war for {TGT_SYSTEM.name}! To the victor the spoils!

column2: Don't want to risk anything here?' I think they forget that we're putting our necks on the line. I suppose if the pay is good that's what we do.\n----\n'Don't want to risk anything here?' I think they forget that we're putting our necks on the line. I suppose if the pay is good that's what we do.
column3: Не хотят здесь рисковать ничем?' Думаю, они забывают, что это мы рискуем шеями. Я думаю, что если нам хорошо заплатят, то мы этим занимаемся.

column2: Defeat the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} duelist
column3: Победите дуэлянта {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}

column2: The Governor of {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has been challenged to a proxy war duel by a rival {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Governor. We'd like you to be his proxy in this fight. If you lose, we'll just deny it was ever agreed to. We don't want to actually risk anything here.
column3: The Governor of {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has been challenged to a proxy war duel by a rival {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Governor. We'd like you to be his proxy in this fight. If you lose, we'll just deny it was ever agreed to. We don't want to actually risk anything here.
